headline.main: POPE ASKS CHILE TO PRESERVE FAITH; Pius Broadcasts to National Eucharistic Congress His Hopes for World Peace URGES RETURN TO CHURCH 500,000 Parade in Santiago in the Final Ceremony of Catholic Festival

lead_paragraph: ROME, Nov. 9 (AP) -- Pope Pius in a broadcast today to Chile's National Eucharistic Congress at Santiago expressed hopes for world peace and preservation of Chile's religious faith against "false doctrines, immorality, disbelief and reborn paganism."
abstract: Pope urges peace, radio s to Natl Eucharistic Cong
